MemberSignature.Value: public: property double MiterLimit { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.MiterLimit : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要将此钢笔的 减为一半的斜接长度的比率限制。

span.span: Gets or sets the limit on the ratio of the miter length to half this pen's .

value.span: 要将钢笔的 减为一半的斜接长度的比率限制。

span.span: The limit on the ratio of the miter length to half the pen's .

value.span: 此值始终为大于或等于 1 的正数。

span.span: This value is always a positive number greater than or equal to 1.
The default value is 10.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 斜接是通过使每个两个图面进行联接来构成角部。A miter is a joint made by beveling each of two surfaces to be joined to form a corner. 当两条线段锐角相交时时，斜接可能会超出线粗细的路径。When two line segments meet at a sharp angle, the miter may extend beyond the thickness of the line that strokes the path. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性将创建的两条线段的角部的大小限制。The following example shows how to use the property to limit the size of a corner created by two line segments. [!code-xaml[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#PenMiterLimitExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/XAML/PenMiterLimitExample.xaml#penmiterlimitexamplewholepage)] 下图显示了此代码示例生成。The following illustration shows what this code example produces. ![显示 MiterLimit 示例。剪切形成的角。](~/add/media/graphicsmiterlimit.png "显示 MiterLimit 示例。剪切形成的角。")![Shows MiterLimit example. Corner formed is cut.](~/add/media/graphicsmiterlimit.png "Shows MiterLimit example. Corner formed is cut.")
